name: YSG
body:
### Yeast Systems Group (YSG)
![The beautiful S. cerevisiae](http://web.mit.edu/yarden/www/scer2.png)

## Upcoming meeting

Overview of YSG and guest talk by Rebecca Shapiro (from Jim Collins lab at MIT/Broad)
Wednesday, Feb 4, 2015
12:30 pm
415M-CR-Katahdin Room (2001)

### Readings

* David Botstein and Gerry Fink. ["Yeast: An Experimental Organism for 21st Century Biology"](http://web.mit.edu/yarden/www/ysg/pdfs/"pdfs/Yeast_21st_Century_Organism.pdf)

## Mailing list




Contact Yarden Katz for info.
